definition: Three-Self Patriotic Movement, PRC government-sanctioned Protestant church from 1949
pinyin: San1 zi4 Ai4 guo2 Jiao4 hui4

definition: China Education and Research Network (CERNET)/abbr. to 中國教育網|中国教育网[Zhong1 guo2 Jiao4 yu4 Wang3]
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Jiao4 yu4 he2 Ke1 yan2 Ji4 suan4 ji1 Wang3
containing_words.word: 中国教育和科研计算机网

definition: abbr. for 中國教育和科研計算機網|中国教育和科研计算机网[Zhong1 guo2 Jiao4 yu4 he2 Ke1 yan2 Ji4 suan4 ji1 Wang3]
UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Jiao4 Ke1 Wen2 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: UNESCO’s online forum on Inclusive Education is open.
sentences.chinese: 联合国教科文组织全纳教育网上论坛开始了。

sentences.english: Chinese Education Department also made an urgent announcement, appeal people to raise alertness.
sentences.chinese: 中国教育部周四也发出紧急通知，呼吁提高警戒。

sentences.english: He is expected to be enthroned early next year as the spiritual leader of the Church of England.
sentences.chinese: 预计他将于明年年初登位，成为英国国教的精神领袖。

sentences.english: As a result, it has become a member of NESCO in 1996.
sentences.chinese: 1996年，学校成为联合国教科文组织俱乐部成员。

sentences.english: Ustinov later became a staunch6 advocate for UNESCO.
sentences.chinese: 乌斯季诺夫后来成为联合国教科文组织的坚定拥护者。

sentences.english: Darius I, when in power, Zoroastrian as the state religion.
sentences.chinese: 大流士一世当政时，琐罗亚斯德教定为国教。

sentences.english: Pride is the idolatrous worship of ourselves, and that is the national religion of hell.
sentences.chinese: 骄傲是对自己的偶像崇拜，是地狱的国教。

sentences.english: The Italian-born prelate is an expert in dealing with China Church affairs.
sentences.chinese: 这位意大利出生的牧者是中国教会专家。

sentences.english: Until now, UNESCO has established more than 550 chairs.
sentences.chinese: 目前，联合国教科文组织共设立了550多个教席。

sentences.english: Let us pray for the influx of cults from abroad and believers being led astray.
sentences.chinese: 让我们为中国教会能维持纯正的信仰来祷告。

sentences.english: When you subscribe to an established religion, you have only two options.
sentences.chinese: 你若要信仰某种国教，就只有两个选择。

sentences.english: Ann-Therese Ndong-Jatta is education director for UNESCO in Africa.
sentences.chinese: Jatta是联合国教科文组织非洲办事处教育主任。

sentences.english: The minister left the Church of England and went across to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 该教士脱离了英国国教圣公会，皈依了罗马天主教。

sentences.english: Nonconformists retained a deep distrust of their Anglican neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 非英国国教者一直不信任圣公会的人。

sentences.english: After that, Mr. Yuan Guiren, Minister of Education of Chin, will deliver concluding remarks.
sentences.chinese: 之后，中国教育部部长袁贵仁先生将作总结讲话。

definition: union of religious and political rule/theocracy/Caesaropapism
the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican
old teachings/wisdom from the past/old church/the Catholic Church 天主教 as opposed to Protestantism 新教
lit. true religion/orthodox religion/orthodox Christianity/Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)
